description: With the advent of our modern way of life came a parallel need for energy to power it.  The biggest source of power is produced from oil.  Oil is usually found buried beneath the Earth’s surface, and often also beneath the ocean.  Extracting this valuable resource takes precision engineering and technology along with extreme caution.  A small mistake in extraction can lead to horrific environmental impacts.  Sadly, there have been many such accidents. This digital book takes a look at the most significant oil spills in human history and explains their impact.  Including in this title are sections covering BP Deepwater Horizon, Sea Star, MT Haven, Ixtoc, Lakeview Gusher, MV Braer and many more. Download this ebook today and become fully aware of man’s environmental mishaps with oil.
